title: Want To Trade T206 Beater Commons?
author: T206Collector

posts.post_title: Want To Trade T206 Beater Commons?

posts.post_content:
Looking to trade the 3 non-pirates for my post-war set needs...Pm me if you have any low grade '52s/60BB or EX-MT+/NM '57, 70-72BB...

[IMG]http://i434.photobucket.com/albums/qq66/nollpm/t206s.jpg[/IMG]

Nothing to help you with on that front, sorry.  But the condition of those 6 is perfectly within my collecting focus.  

If anyone has any other beater T206s they want to swap, I'd even go my 5 for 4 of yours.

Let me know!

[url]signedt206@gmail.com[/url]
I've got 7 t206 beaters but need to get them on a scanner.  They all have their top and side borders cut off.  Abbaticchio, J.J. Clarke, Criss, Evans, Hinchman, Jacklitsch, White.
